text: Severino Reija VÃ¡zquez (born 25 November 1938) is a Spanish former footballer. He played as a defender. He participated with the national team at the 1962 FIFA World Cup, the 1964 European Nations' Cup, and the 1966 FIFA World Cup. ==Other websites== * * National team data at BDFutbol * * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spain at the 1962 FIFA World Cup Category:Spain at the 1966 FIFA World Cup
